You can now edit it using the drag-and-drop editor."},"styles":{"fontSize":"16px","color":"#666666","textAlign":"left"}},{"id":"element-1746216606355","type":"html","content":{"html":"
Dubai New Greenest Community by Majid Al Futtaim
 

CAPRIA - GHAFWOODS

Dubai New Greenest Community

Choose from 1,2, & 3 Bedroom Apartment

Starting Price 1.5 Million AED
REGISTER YOUR INTEREST

An Opportunity to earn 2-3x your Investment!
GET MORE DETAILS
DETAILS VIA WHATSAPP
 

CAPRIA UNIT TYPES
 

✅ 1 Bedroom - 829 sq.ft to 899 sq.ft
✅ 2 Bedrooms - 1,248 sq.ft to 1,699 sq.ft
✅ 3 Bedrooms - 1,968 sq.ft to 2,080 sq.ft
OPEN BROCHURE
BROCHURE VIA WHATSAPP
 

FOREST STYLE LUXURY LIVING
 

Crafted to create an environment and culture that promotes health and wellbeing in all its forms, the Capria sanctuary is a haven of serenity and wellness.
Designed using salutogenic principles, every element of this ecosystem enhances positive wellbeing factors, rather than simply preventing negative ones. 

✅ Outdoor Dining - Outdoor Lounge
✅  Active & Social Pavilions
✅  Wellness Pool
✅  Children's Play | Yoga Deck
✅  Sunken Courtyards
✅  Edible Garden | Stepped Gardens
✅  Central Forest Access | Valley Drive

Beneath the forest lies the meandering Valley Drive, a nature-infused collection of stately canyon-like pathways, connecting residents to stunning flower drop-off areas and grand lobby entrances.

✅  2 Min - Global Village & IMG World
✅  15 Min - City Centre Mirdif & City Centre Me'aisem
✅  20 Min - Mall of The Emirates | DXB Airport 
✅  25 Min - Dubai Marina | Palm Jumeirah
VIEW FLOOR PLAN
FLOOR PLAN WHATSAPP

Unsubscribe
